Package com.atakmap.map.layer.feature

Interface FeatureDefinition

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FeatureCursor, FeatureDefinition2, FeatureDefinition3
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BruteForceLimitOffsetFeatureCursor, FeatureCursorWrapper, FeatureDataSource.FeatureDefinition, MultiplexingFeatureCursor, NativeFeatureCursor, OffsetIdFeatureCursor
    public interface FeatureDefinition
    The definition of a feature. Feature properties may be recorded as raw, unprocessed data of several well-defined types. Utilization of unprocessed data may yield significant a performance advantage depending on the intended storage.
